Title: Relates to the capital access program
Summary: Relates to the capital access program; focuses on minority business enterprises and small businesses located in highly distressed areas to assist them in processing and being approved for qualifying program loans; requires the engagement in outreach and marketing to financial institutions to increase awareness of the program.
LawCode: Amd ยง212, Bank L; amd ยง16-k, UDC Act
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the banking law and the New York state urban development corporation act, in relation to the capital access program
